Random Music Generator

Created: December 14th, 2018 by Alex Sheen
Desmos visualization of pitch shifting applied to a sine wave

Language : Java


Randomly generates music in a random major or minor scale with notes of varying pitch and duration.

Encodes audio signal into an array according to standard CD audio of 44100 samples per second.

Simulates kick drum by applying pitch shifting the frequency of sine waves.

Applies randomized pitch and volume envelopes to notes

Desmos visualization of variable volume envelopes

Link to Pitch Shift Visualization
Link to Volume Envelope Visualization
